text.tspan: Share in poverty relative to different poverty thresholds, World, 1981 to
Poverty thresholds are adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices. Depending on the country and year, the data relates to either income or
